actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all signatures on discharge petitions be made public immediately.

summary.text: Amends rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to provide an up-to-date list that identifies the names of all Members of the House that sign a motion to discharge a committee from the consideration of a public bill or resolution. Requires such petition to be made available for public inspection on a daily basis and during normal working hours.

titles.title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that all signatures on discharge petitions be made public immediately.
